name: zringnrg

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(zring, cnrg), wcel(ccnfld, cnrg), wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
stmt.pretty: mp2an(ZZring ∈ NrmRing, CCfld ∈ NrmRing, ℤ ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))

body.origin:
|- wcel(zring, cnrg)
-| wcel(ccnfld, cnrg)
-| wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))
-| wi(wa(wcel(ccnfld, cnrg), wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), wcel(zring, cnrg))
body.pretty:
⊢ ZZring ∈ NrmRing
⊣ CCfld ∈ NrmRing
⊣ ℤ ∈(SubRing ` CCfld)
⊣ ((CCfld ∈ NrmRing ∧ ℤ ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))→ ZZring ∈ NrmRing)
